00025 #ifndef _Codec_H__
00026 #define _Codec_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgreDataChunk.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00041     class _OgreExport Codec
00042     {
00043     protected:
00046         static std::map< String, Codec* > ms_mapCodecs;
00047 
00048     public:
00049         class CodecData 
00050         {
00051         public:
00052             virtual ~CodecData() {};
00053 
00056             virtual String dataType() { return "CodecData"; };
00057         };
00058 
00059     public:
00062         static void registerCodec( Codec *pCodec )
00063         {
00064             ms_mapCodecs[pCodec->getType()] = pCodec;
00065         }
00066 
00069         static std::map< String, Codec* >& getColl()
00070         {
00071             return ms_mapCodecs;
00072         }
00073 
00079         virtual void code( const DataChunk& input, DataChunk* output, ... ) const = 0;
00080 
00089         virtual CodecData * decode( const DataChunk& input, DataChunk* output, ... ) const = 0;
00090 
00093         virtual String getType() const = 0;
00094     };
00095 
00096 } // namespace
00097 
00098 #endif
